Chinese: 图中的<物体>一样大吗？
图中的<物体>颜色一样吗？
图中的商品<特定商品属性>一样吗？
图中的商品适用场合一样吗？
图中的商品适用人群一样吗？
图片中是否阐明了<specific theory>这样的道理？
English: Are the <objects> in the picture the same size?
Are the <objects> in the picture the same color?
Are the products in the picture <specific product attributes> the same?
Are the products in the picture suitable for the same situations?
Are the products in the picture suitable for the same people?
Does the picture illustrate <specific theory>?

Chinese: 图中的<物体>一样大吗？
图中的<物体>颜色一样吗？
对比图中<物体>的<特定属性>。
图中的商品<特定商品属性>一样吗？
图中的商品适用场合一样吗？
图中的商品适用人群一样吗？
请详细描述画面，并告诉我图片中发生了什么事情。
请详细描述图片，并告诉我图片阐明了什么道理。
请详细解释图片，并说明图片想表达的核心思想。
English: Is the <object> in the picture the same size?
Is the color of the <object> in the picture the same?
Compare the <specific attributes> of the <object> in the figure.
Is the product <specific product attributes> in the picture the same?
Is the product in the picture suitable for the same occasion?
Is the product in the picture suitable for the same audience?
Please describe the scene in detail and tell me what happened in the picture.
Please provide a detailed description of the image and tell me what it illustrates.
Please provide a detailed explanation of the image and explain the core idea it intends to convey.
